Params: {1: 'Kowloong', 2: 'November 10, 00:43', 4: "1 hour and 3 minutes till Huaxu's firewall collapses", 5: '1410m under Kowloong, Tabula Akasha Central Control Room'}
{3: 'Bai Gui, waiting at the doorway, bows to Qu as she enters the hall. Nonetheless, Qu proceeds without pausing, striding inside with the data humanoid hovering beside her.'}
{2: 'Bai Gui, Chiwen Crew', 3: 'According to the plan... we have prepared everything.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bai Gui, Chiwen Crew', 3: 'She will arrive with the people coming down here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bai Gui, Chiwen Crew', 3: "You may need to personally check Huaxu's status.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Qu comes to a stop in front of the central console of the hall. Behind the glass walls, a golden spiral rotates slowly.'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'As of now, the physical damage rate... bzzz... Tabula Akasha... 27.3%...'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'While maintaining the computing power of Tabula Akasha... bzzz...'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: 'The firewall redundancy penetration rate... 37%... I will continue...'}
{2: 'Huaxu', 3: "Ensure the safety of... Tabula Akasha's... bzzz... data..."}
{3: 'The spiral behind the glass curtain wall continues its dance, yet Huaxu has already fallen silent.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Work with Bai Gui to balance the distribution of computing power between Huaxu and Tabula Akasha.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "Allocate maximum computing power to Huaxu while ensuring Tabula Akasha's safety.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'If Huaxu falls... everything here will be over.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The two figures dissipate upon her order, leaving Qu alone in the vast hall once again.'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "It's time to checkmate... in this game.", 4: '1'}
